name: Call Recorder
description: Call & Voice Recorder App lets you record incoming and outgoing phone calls and voice.   This version will give you a fully functional trial to record and play back as many call as youd like. You will not be charged during your trial and only will be charged at the end of your trial.   SUBSCRIBE TO UNLOCK TONS OF FEATURES    Record your incoming calls    Record your outgoing calls    No limit on how long you can record a call for    No limit on how many recordings you make    Unlimited number of recordings   Access to call recording laws    Beautiful easy to use interface    Push notifications take you to the recording   New features added all the time    One low subscription rate  NOTE: Call & Voice Recorder App requires your carrier supports 3-way calling. SimpleTalk and H2o Wireless do NOT offer this in the US.  Pages:  - Privacy policy: https://android.callrecorderpro.app/privacy  - Term of use: https://android.callrecorderpro.app/terms  - About: https://android.callrecorderpro.app/about   Support:  You can write about anything to info@callrecorderpro.app
